description: [``botocore``] Add ability to manually and automatically roll back a pipeline stage to a previously successful execution.
[``botocore``] This release adds support for specifying if Answering Machine should wait for prompt sound.
[``botocore``] This release introduces support for Source Accounts to define which Metrics and Logs to share with the Monitoring Account
[``botocore``] SupportsLimitlessDatabase field added to describe-db-engine-versions to indicate whether the DB engine version supports Aurora Limitless Database.
